context: Fracture Treatment,Joint Dislocation Treatment,Total Hip Replacement,Limb Deformities,Knee Pain Treatment,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited the doc after 3 weeks of my injury. I accidently twisted my ankle and the pain was not reducing. Just withing 5 mins of explanation to the doc, he recommended to get an X-ray done as the pain was unberable. It was a hairline fracture and I got my leg casted for 3 weeks. After getting it removed, the pain completely subsided and I‚Äôm now able to walk as much as I want to. 
Dr. Amit is the friendliest doctor I have ever met. He also helps through texts and calls which is the most convenient way in today‚Äôs time. I definitely recommend Dr. Amit to the people reading this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was suffering from achilles tendon tear in my ankle, met dr amit for it at sparsh hospital gurgaon.
He asked me to get mri done.
Mri clearly showed complete tear of my achilles tendon.
He adviced for surgery. Earlier i was mot happy with going for surgery but he convinced me explaining my illness in detail n why surgery was important.
Surgery went very well.
6 weeks later, m doing exercises well and i have started walking also.
Recovering well üôè
Thank you Doctor saab for correct guidance

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We met Doctor for spine injury wherein i had spinal fracture. He adviced us to undergo a minimally invasive surgery to avoid future complications. Initially we were a little hesitant, but he explained us pro and cons on detail. We even took a second opinion and ultimately we underwent surgery by dr amit. And m thankful that i listened to dr amits advice. Today i am back to normal self, started doing all my routine activities comfortably.. thank you doc üëçüôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Got my humerus bone operated by Dr amit.
Surgery went good. 3 months later today, i am able to do all my activities which i did before my injury. Feels very good to get back to my life again. 
Would like to thank dr amit and his team for making sure everything goes smooth during my stay in th hospital.
Special mention to his friendly and caring nature. Made me feel like his family all the way

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Thank you Dr, Amit and team. Everyone was very friendly and I am grateful that you are in my nearby area. When you consult Amit sir, It's like dealing with a trusted family member.
He is a talented young orthopaedic surgeon in gurgaon. 
Diagnosed my cervical issue instantly. And started me on meds and physiotherapy and I am feeling much much better now. Able to work out which I badly wanted to resume. Very approachable.
Hes the go to man for any orthopedic problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Doctor Amit for knee pain. Many doctors had adviced total knee replacement but my father was hesitant on getting it done at this age. Doctor understood our point and gave us alternative options of injections and physiotherapy that has worked wonders for my father till date. He has been doing his day to day activities comfortably now. Can't thank Dr Amit enough for this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I highly recommend Dr. Amit Sinha to everyone who have any orthopaedic issues. First thing, he is good at his job being humble at the same time. Secondly, he is so humane. He exceeded our expectations in terms of patient care and satisfaction. God bless him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I came to Dr Amit for my father‚Äôs knee fracture. Extremely happy with the way things went. Had gone ahead with surgery as recommended by him, today by gods grace my father started to walk without support. The most important thing we loved about him was the special care he took throughout the surgery and even afterwards..
Happy to recommend Dr Amit Sinha to everyone üëç

tags: None
review:
We visited Dr Amit for my mother's spine problem. She was suffering from back problem since ages. Many doctors suggested surgery is the only option and due to her age and other problems, we didn't want to go for surgery.
But Dr Amit told us, let's try medicine and physiotherapy first. Took care of my mom like her mom, even sent exercise videos to help us. Was easily approachable over phone also whenever needed.
Today my mom started to walk with support of belt after so many years.
We can't thank you enough Dr Amit sinha for your constant support and guidance.
May god bless you always üôè
